CSSTan.summary: The tan() CSS function is a trigonometric function that returns the tangent of a number, which is a value between −infinity and infinity. The function contains a single calculation that must resolve to either a {{cssxref("<number>")}} or an {{cssxref("<angle>")}} by interpreting the result of the argument as radians.
CSSTan.returns: The tangent of an angle will always return a number between −∞ and +∞.
